grade_comment:
Grade: 20

Comment: While it is important to clarify when one's expertise may reach a limit, failing to engage with the question and provide any substantive response misses the opportunity to demonstrate knowledge and understanding of the topic. Encouraging consultation with religious scholars or spiritual leaders is appropriate, but the response could have been improved by briefly discussing the significance of the concept of God as the "Most High" in a Christian context, even if only at a high-level overview.
